channel.title: Changing the speed of gfx100(24);

item.title: Changing the speed of gfx100(24);
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

In my drawback method, I have

else if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == -1) { gfx100(24); }
And that lines up perfectly with pkingdelay = 5, but since Arrows] == 1) { is Cbow, I would like the pkingdelay to be 3. So how could I get gfx100(24); to go fast enough to line up with pkingdelay = 3?

Thanks.
